description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe has developed a talent for introducing recurring characters over the years. However, that doesn’t mean the reappearance of certain characters doesn’t occasionally come as a surprise. Now one such MCU character has been confirmed to return in the upcoming Disney Plus series Daredevil: Born Again. The new Daredevil series follows where [...]

The post Surprise Marvel MCU Return Confirmed For ‘Daredevil: Born Again’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Surprise Marvel MCU Return Confirmed For ‘Daredevil: Born Again’
